page.title: 17INDUSTRY(2)
page.content: {Leyland Paints}was founded in 1922 as Leyland Paints and Varnish Co. Ltd. making water based paints.Now their product range include gloss paints, heavy duty paints, and exterior paints.At the moment the company is introducing a computorised system, where one man can control six mixing tubs at once plus a reserve This latter move along with computor controlled assembly lines at{Leyland {Motors}(now part of{British Leyland) have led over the last few years to a gradual reduction in the workforce in these old established industries with a resulting rise in the levels of unemployment in Leyland.
